des:
With the Resideo skill for Alexa, you can interact with your Resideo ecosystem with your voice and routines. 
This skill is compatible with Round Smart Thermostat, T-Series Smart Thermostats, C1 and C2 Wi-Fi Security Cameras, Water Leak & Freeze Detector, Smart Home Security, and any attached Z-Wave Lights/Outlets/Switches. If you have a Total Connect Comfort (TCC) Wi-Fi thermostat, please use the Total Connect Comfort skill. 

Latest updates:
- T9 and T10 Smart Room Sensor control: once you set up a sensor in the bedroom, ask Alexa to set the bedroom to 72 degrees, and T9 or T10 will switch to 'selected rooms' mode, and start prioritizing the bedroom.

To get started, select the ‘Enable Skill’ button in the Alexa App to link your Resideo account and discover your thermostat(s).

When using the skill, you need to specify by name which thermostat/sensor to use. There are two ways to define this/these names:
- Use the name(s) you set up already – these are shown and can be changed in the Honeywell Home app, or
- Create an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs, and add the thermostat and/or one or more devices to the group.
Once you know the name or group of your device, you can say the following: “Alexa, decrease the Bedroom by 3 degrees”, or “Alexa, set Downstairs temperature to 72”.


The full list of commands is below:

Thermostat commands:
- “Alexa, set [group or thermostat name] to X degrees”
- “Alexa, increase [group or thermostat name] by X degrees”
- “Alexa, decrease [group or thermostat name] by X degrees”
- “Alexa, what is the [group or thermostat name] set to?”
- “Alexa, what is the temperature of [group or thermostat name]?”
- “Alexa, set [Thermostat Name] to (Heat/Cool/Auto/Off)”
- “Alexa, set [group or thermostat name] to x degrees until 7 PM” *
- “Alexa, set the Living Room to 72 degrees until 7:15PM”. 
- “Alexa, resume [thermostat name] schedule” *

*Make sure to use 15 minute time intervals. You can set holds up to 23 hours and 45 minutes in the future. After the hold, your thermostat will automatically return to following your schedule. This command will only work on T-Series Smart Thermostats with 7 day scheduling enabled. Round Smart Thermostats or devices in Geofencing control mode will not accept these commands.

Camera and Water Leak commands:
- “Alexa, show my [Camera name]”
- “Alexa, what is the temperature of [Water Leak Detector name]?”
- “Alexa, turn on [Camera name]?”

Note: Turn off is not currently supported for security reasons.

Smart Home Security commands:
- “Alexa, arm my home in [Stay, Night, Away] mode.”
- “Alexa, disarm my home.” (Alexa voice pin required)
- “Alexa, is my home armed?”
- “Alexa, is my home disarmed?”

Note: Make sure to enable the “Alexa Voice Pin” in the Alexa Mobile App to Disarm your system via Alexa.

Z-Wave lights/outlets/switches commands:
- “Alexa, turn on [device name].”
- “Alexa, turn off [device name].”
- “Alexa, set [device name] brightness to 50.”
